name: CollectWise
headline: Automating consumer debt collection with AI
description:
CollectWise automates consumer debt collection with AI. We’re outperforming collection firms by 2X and have successfully serviced over $2 million in debts.

Our platform handles the entire late-stage recovery process, allowing creditors to recover debts that couldn’t be resolved through voluntary communications. CollectWise's AI agents automate pre-legal outreach, asset research, litigation, credit reporting, and enforcement actions like garnishments and liens.

founders.name: Sean OBrien, Founder
founders.description: I'm the co-founder and CEO of CollectWise. Before CollectWise, I scaled a digital agency to six figures in annual revenue, ran another fintech startup, and studied Computer Science & Finance at the University of Virginia.

founders.name: Vivek Isukapalli, Founder
founders.description: I’m the Co-Founder and CTO of CollectWise. In the past, I developed Fintech and AI products and studied Information Systems at Carnegie Mellon University.

generated_description:
**Company Summary: CollectWise**

**Mission:** CollectWise aims to revolutionize consumer debt collection through automation powered by AI. Founded in 2024 and backed by the Y Combinator Batch F24, this innovative platform already manages late-stage recovery processes with impressive results.

**Performance:** CollectWise is setting a new standard in the debt collection space by outperforming traditional collection firms by 2X, having successfully handled over $2 million in debts. Their advanced AI-driven agents automate essential processes such as pre-legal outreach, asset research, litigation, and even enforcement actions like garnishments and liens.

**How It Works:** The platform streamlines all stages of debt recovery, focusing particularly on those challenging debts that can't be resolved through basic communication. CollectWise's approach not only boosts recovery rates but also reduces costs—clients experience a standard recovery time of just 20 days and see a remarkable 50% reduction in collection costs. 

**Key Benefits:**
- **Higher Liquidation Rates:** CollectWise promises a 2X increase in liquidation success.
- **Cost Efficiency:** Their autonomous AI reduces the reliance on expensive third-party collection agencies.
- **Brand Management:** Communications with debtors maintain respect and amicability, preserving a positive brand image for clients and ensuring compliance with regulations.

**Team:** The company may have a small team of just two employees, but they carry the ambition and technological expertise to disrupt the industry.

**Leadership & Support:** Nicolas Dessaigne serves as the Group Partner for CollectWise, steering the company towards its ambitious goals.

**Get Involved:** Interested parties can easily explore their offerings through their demo requests on the website – [CollectWise](https://collectwise.com).

In a world where efficient debt recovery can make or break a business, CollectWise stands out with its blend of technology and empathy, making it a compelling option for creditors looking to maximize debt recovery without sacrificing their brand integrity.
